messages.message:
Small nits on the home page redesign:
1. The "recents" text is vertically center-aligned with the buttons but "deployments" and "document reviews" texts are top-aligned. Thus, the top padding seems a bit larger for the "recents" section than the other sections
2. "See all apps" has a different styling than other sections. Should we make it into a button for consistency?
3. Click "see all apps". I need to click the browser back button twice to go back to the home page. The URLs change from `/hub?tab=All` to `/hub` to `/`
cc @Weiming Wu
